mapper.select: /* [ToteCellExceptTxnMapper.xml] selectToteCellExceptTxn */ SELECT ET.CELL_EXCEPT_SEQ AS cellExceptSeq, ET.TOTE_ID AS toteId, ET.TOTE_ID_SEQ AS toteIdSeq, ET.WAREHOUSE_KEY AS warehouseKey, ET.WMS_PICKING_DATE AS wmsPickingDate, 'FIX' AS pickingType, ET.ALLOC_TYPE AS allocType, ET.EXCEPT_TXN_TYPE AS exceptTxnType, ET.GROUP_NO AS groupNo, ET.WORK_BATCH_NO AS workBatchNo, ET.SHIP_ORDER_KEY AS shipOrderKey, ET.SHIP_ORDER_ITEM_SEQ AS shipOrderItemSeq, CT.EQP_ID AS qpsNum, ET.SHIP_UID_KEY AS shipUidKey, ET.SHIP_UID_ITEM_SEQ AS shipUidItemSeq, ET.SKU_CODE AS skuCode, ET.SKU_NAME AS skuName, ET.SKU_SUB_NAME AS skuSubName, ET.QTY_QPS_EXCEPT AS qtyQpsExcept, ET.TO_SKU_CODE AS toSkuCode, ET.TO_SKU_NAME AS toSkuName, ET.TO_SKU_SUB_NAME AS toSkuSubName, ET.FROM_SKU_CODE AS fromSkuCode, ET.FROM_SKU_NAME AS fromSkuName, ET.FROM_SKU_SUB_NAME AS fromSkuSubName, ET.PICKING_BATCH_NO AS pickBatchGroup, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AS insertedDate, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS') AS insertedTime, ET.MODIFIED_USER AS insertedUser FROM o_wcs.TB_QPS_CELL_EXCEPT_TXN ET LEFT OUTER JOIN o_wcs.TB_COM_CELL_MST CT ON CT.CELL_ID = ET.CELL_ID WHERE ET.EXCEPT_IF_YN = 'N' ORDER BY ET.CELL_EXCEPT_SEQ ASC
